tool.name: SAGA.table_calculus.8
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayORDER False output_data_NOGAPS $output_data_NOGAPS name SAGA.table_calculus.8 TABLE $TABLE ORDER $ORDER METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_NOGAPS $OutputSection_NOGAPS.outputType_NOGAPS transmissionMode_NOGAPS $OutputSection_NOGAPS.transmissionMode_NOGAPS

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ORDER
param.label: Order
param.help: Order The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_NOGAPS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_NOGAPS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool inserts records where the chosen order field has gaps expecting an increment of one. It is assumed that the order field represents integers.
